name: A Girl From London
lyric:
She was a rich girl
I knew her at a party
And she lived in downtown
Everyone knew her name
She never wanna stay
She's bloody cool
She's just as proud as what she is
She's a girl from nowhere
I gonna gonna love her
I gonna gonna love her
I gonna gonna love her
She's got a new tattoo
She's got a pretty belly
She's like a chocalate
That i never tasted
She gave me new dreams
And she know what i am
I wanna **** her the way she likes
Every day and every hour
I gonna gonna love her
I gonna gonna love her
I gonna gonna love her

I gonna gonna love her
I gonna gonna love her
I gonna gonna love her
lyric_extra: 文本歌词最后由 GoodTM 编辑于2019-09-11 23:07
